main.under_video: The photo, taken from a bird's eye view over Kazan, provides a breathtaking panoramic view of the city, revealing its beauty and architectural diversity.

places.title: Interesting Places
places.info: Kazan is visited by more than 2 million tourists annually who strive to see the most interesting places in the city. Now we will tell you about them.

sport.list_tittle: Sports Teams and Clubs of Kazan
